Name: Bee Balm
SeedDescription: Plant in fall. Takes 9 days to produce an attractive flower.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en otoño. Toma 9 días para producir una flor atractiva.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen sie im Herbst. Wächst in 10 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 秋植えの花。9日かけて魅惑的な花を咲かせる。色は咲いてのおたのしみ。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no outono. Demoram 9 dias para produzir uma flor seduzente.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天播种。9天后可收获迷人的花。
